Package tetris.boards.modernTetris

Class SenderModernTetrisBoardWithPhysics

java.lang.Object
tetris.boards.Board
tetris.boards.BoardWithPhysics
tetris.boards.modernTetris.ModernTetrisBoardWithPhysics
tetris.boards.modernTetris.SenderModernTetrisBoardWithPhysics
public class SenderModernTetrisBoardWithPhysics extends ModernTetrisBoardWithPhysics
A Modern Tetris board that broadcasts its state to an output stream.

This class extends the playable physics board to intercept key game events (movement, locking, garbage generation) and send them via the SenderBoardOutputHandler. This is used for the "Local Player" in a multiplayer match.

    • lockFallingTetrominoAndClearLines

      protected int lockFallingTetrominoAndClearLines()
      Intercepts line clears to generate garbage attacks sent to the opponent.

      Garbage Rules:

      • 2 Lines cleared -> Send 1 Line
      • 3 Lines cleared -> Send 2 Lines
      • 4 Lines cleared (Tetris) -> Send 4 Lines

      Overrides:
      lockFallingTetrominoAndClearLines in class ModernTetrisBoardWithPhysics
      Returns:
      Number of cleared lines.
